# Celestial Totem, Greater (Su)
## Overview
*Celestial Totem, Greater (Su):* While raging, the barbarian gains spell resistance equal to 11 + the barbarianâ€™s class level against spells with the evil descriptor. She also gains a +2 bonus on all saving throws against spells and effects from evil creatures. A barbarian must have the celestial totem rage power and be at least 12th level to select this rage power.

**Source:** Champions of Purity 22
